name: Zombie Murder Hell Arrives
description: Command two robots with their own shooting methods. Choose which one to control, using different parameters and super attacks. Shooting monsters will help you upgrade your robot of choice. Face a giant boss at the end of each scene!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Процессор: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Место на диске: 65 MB
